00021 /**
00022  *  @brief  BTSP algorithm parameters
00023  */
00024 typedef struct arrow_baltsp_params
00025 {
00026     int with_improvements;          /**< use running-time improvments */
00027     int lower_bound;                /**< balanced TSP lower bound */
00028     int btsp_min_cost;              /**< smallest cost in a BTSP tour */
00029     int btsp_max_cost;              /**< largest cost in a BTSP tour */
00030     int mstsp_min_cost;             /**< smallest cost in a MSTSP tour */
00031     int num_steps;                  /**< the number of solve plan steps */
00032     arrow_btsp_solve_plan *steps;   /**< solve plan steps */
00033     int infinity;                   /**< value to use for "infinity" */
00034     int deep_copy;
00035     double timebound;               /**< maximum time to spend on problem */
00036 } arrow_baltsp_params;

00105 /**

00113 /**

00117  */

00119 arrow_baltsp_fun_ut(int shallow, arrow_btsp_fun *fun);

00121 /**
00122  *  @brief  BalTSP Controled Shake.
00123  *  @param  shallow [in] ARROW_TRUE for shallow copy, ARROW_FALSE for deep
00124  *  @param  infinity [in] value to use as "infinity"

00126  *  @param  random_max [in] maximum random value to generate
00127  *  @param  info [in] information about the original problem
00128  *  @param  fun [out] function structure
00129  */

00131 arrow_baltsp_fun_shake(int shallow, int infinity, 
00132                        int random_min, int random_max,
00133                        arrow_problem_info *info, arrow_btsp_fun *fun);
